Navigation

Inboxes

Add or remove agent bot

POST

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

inboxes

/

{id}

/

set\_agent\_bot

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/inboxes/{id}/set_agent_bot \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "agent_bot": 1
}'
```

204

403

404

Copy

```
This response does not have an example.
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/add-or-remove-agent-bot#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/add-or-remove-agent-bot#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/add-or-remove-agent-bot#parameter-id)

id

number

required

ID of the inbox

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/add-or-remove-agent-bot#body-agent-bot)

agent\_bot

number

required

Agent bot ID

Example:

`1`

#### Response

204

204403404

Success
